evidence.claim: Synchron uses AWS for cloud infrastructure and data storage.
The company ensures HIPAA compliance in its operations related to health data.
Synchron supports FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration patterns include usage of RESTful APIs for third-party service interactions.
The platform utilizes webhook integrations to streamline data transmission.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 or EDI use cases on their site.
